text: This is a list of artists who have been involved with house music, a genre of electronic dance music. This includes artists who have either been very important to the house music genre or have had a considerable amount of exposure (such as in the case of one who has been on a major label). This list does not include little-known local artists. Groups are listed by the first letter in the group's name (not including the words "a", "an", or "the"), and individuals are listed by first name. ==0–9== *009 Sound System *20 Fingers *2 Puerto
